scenario.name: Basic UAS responder
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[field1 line="[line]"] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: "sipp" <sip:[field0 line="[line]"]@[field1 line="[line]"]>;tag=[call_number] To: "sipp" <sip:[field0 line="[line]"]@[field1 line="[line]"]> Call-ID: reg///[call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: <sip:[field0 line="[line]"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0 User-Agent: SIPp

REGISTER sip:[field1 line="[line]"] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: "sipp" <sip:[field0 line="[line]"]@[field1 line="[line]"]>;tag=[call_number] To: "sipp" <sip:[field0 line="[line]"]@[field1 line="[line]"]> Call-ID: reg///[call_id] CSeq: 2 REGISTER Contact: <sip:[field0 line="[line]"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0 User-Agent: SIPp [field2 line="[line]"]
